Google Maps Link Maker

There is a limit of 10 destinations per Google Maps route link. This tool works around that limit.

Enter one location per line. Starting point will be your current location. Usually you will enter an address, but theoretically GPS coordinates and sometimes names of locations will work.

Data will not be saved if the tab closes or reloads, so you should prepare your destinations somewhere else like Notepad where your work is saved, then copy it here.
